channel.title: Need help adding Admin/mod only commands
channel.description:
Sup i can add normal commands, well teleport commands but i need help making admin/mod only commands.. can someone please help If you could please tell me how to add item commands to e.g
::santa (and then it sends a message or somut lyk you greedy person) (and gives you a santa)
But also lyk ::modzone and ::admin zone needing 1 & 2 rights to teleport to

item.title: Need help adding Admin/mod only commands
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“tele”) && playerRights >= 3) {
teleToX = 3424;
teleToY = 3432;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding Admin/mod only commands

item.title: Need help adding Admin/mod only commands
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Hw do i make it so its a tele command for admins only
e.g
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“santa”) && playerRights >= 3) {
TeletoX:(3424)
and so on.

item.title: Need help adding Admin/mod only commands
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("santa") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(santaid, 1); sendMessage("greedy"); }

see the

playerRights >= 3

Change that to 1 for mod, 2 for admin or 3 for owner.

Make the rest since you know how to do the rest, well… so you say

Read full topic
